title: Dominic Raab – 2021 Statement on 2nd Anniversary of Harry Dunn
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Dominic Raab, the Foreign Secretary, on 27 August 2021.
content:
My deepest condolences are with Harry Dunn’s family on the second anniversary of Harry’s tragic death. I will continue to support the family in their search for justice.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
